=API for generic.math-functions=
by Konrad Hinsen

Usage: 
{{{
(ns <your-namespace>
  (:use clojure.contrib.generic.math-functions))
}}}
==Overview==
<pre> Generic math function interface 
This library defines generic versions of common mathematical 
functions such as sqrt or sin as multimethods that can be 
defined for any type.</pre>


==Public Variables and Functions==
Shortcuts:
[#abs abs] [#acos acos] [#approx= approx=] [#asin asin] [#atan atan] [#atan2 atan2] [#ceil ceil] [#conjugate conjugate] [#cos cos] [#exp exp] [#floor floor] [#log log] [#pow pow] [#rint rint] [#round round] [#sgn sgn] [#sin sin] [#sqr sqr] [#sqrt sqrt] [#tan tan]
